channel.title: Being more evil faction then the percentage
channel.description: I love playing bd but i think most of my games are evil/NK. I've played alot of games, does it make my evil games more likely?

item.title: Being more evil faction then the percentage
item.dc:creator: Icibalus
item.description:
I don’t think evil classes are included in that algorithm.
I think the classes affected by that rule are Mastermind, King, Cult Leader and Prince.

It’s probably just RNG.
